Reviews.Title: “Colorful well located and great value inn”

Reviews.Content: pros quick easy walk zona rosa main metro station blocks spacious colorfully designed safe neighborhood located quiet charming street 25 night cons heat freezing night shower takes 5 minutes hot onsite restaurant pricey amenities basic pay overall hotel stay mexico city considering amazing rates perfectly safe clubs walking distance late night
